title: Angel Bundle 01 - Game Assets + Extra
description: Angel Bundle 01 - Three angel character with Three Wings Mesh (Static) & Variant Material (Black & White)
longDescription:
A unique value pack Angel with Three Wings Mesh (Static) & Variant Material (Black & White) for your game, designed to be versatile for the Modern, Futuristic or Medieval Horror/Action! (-20% OFF)


The separate products can be found here:


Angel 01 - Game Assets + Extra

Angel 02 - Game Assets + Extra

Angel 03 - Game Assets + Extra


Have you already purchased at least one Stigma Studios product on UE MarketPlace? Join on Discord and access to a Limited Promo - You can choose one Product for FREE
This is a limited promotion, if you have ever purchased even a single Stigma Studios product in the UE Marketplace, that will allow you to have one character of your choice for FREE! Once you have entered the Discord, check the #welcome channel and follow the instructions! This promo is not cumulative, is valid only once.
Request for custom character? Take a look Here


Following you can find a Detail Overview video, Demonstration Video and tutorial to retarget UE4 animation to Angel Bundle 01:


Angel Bundle 01 - Detail Overview Video

How Retarget Animation to Angel Character

How to retarget Unreal Engine 5


Updates are planned for this assets in the future and may increase in price!

This type of assets aims to offer a convenient character and does not reflect the quality of "premium" assets.


Join on Discord for:

Limited Promo: Special promotions for all users and loyal users.

Product Support: Receive support for the purchased product.

Update: Track the status of new upcoming production.

Suggestions: Vote the next pack or recommend what you would like see next or future update.


Thanks for the support!


Epic Games Animation is used for display/example only.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Character Pack: Three Character 3d model to get a unique design impact for your game.
  • Extra: Three Wings Mesh (Static) & Variant Material (Black & White Body)
  •  Versatile Design: Model designed to be used in different artistic contexts and be versatile.


Scaled to Epic skeleton: Yes

Rigged: Yes

Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes

Animated: Yes ( ONLY Epic Games Default Third Person Animation for Demonstration purpose retarget to Angel 01,02,03)

Number of Main Characters: 3

Static Mesh Extra - Wings 3

Vertex counts of Angel 01: 17.838

Tris counts of Angel 01: 30.029

Vertex counts of Angel 02: 24.780

Tris counts of Angel 02: 32.930

Vertex counts of Angel 03: 14.682

Tris counts of ngel 03: 26.322

SM_Wing1: Tris. 4.084 Ver. 2.520

SM_Wing2: Tris. 4.148 Ver. 2.461

SM_MiniWing: Tris. 1.493 Ver. 1.064


Texture Resolutions: 4096x4096
